item.title: Removing +playername has logged in
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“super_, post:6, topic:182683”][quote author=eVokki` link=topic=244354.msg2063114#msg2063114 date=1203380025]

if(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) < 11) {
playerXP[3] = 1155;
}
NewHP = playerLevel[3];
if (playerRights > 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}
}

Wich part would i want to remove? I removed playerhandler.messeage but it gave me Errors

if (playerRights > 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}

You can’t just delete

{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}

Because it would still have a if function.
[/quote]
l0l if function ?[/quote]

I would like to remind the honourable super_ that Cowie is a Python programmer, thus meaning he has no fucking clue about real programming!

Read full topic
